document.full_text: the u.s. government is keeping a tight lid on its probe into scores of unexplained dolphin deaths along the gulf coast, possibly connected to last year's bp oil spill, causing tension with some independent marine scientists.
document.title: government tightens lid on dolphin death probe
lines_and_colors: the u.s. government is keeping a tight lid on its probe into scores of unexplained dolphin deaths along the gulf coast, possibly connected to last year's bp oil spill, causing tension with some independent marine scientists.
